categorization.name: Categorization
categorization.template: Categorize the following email into one of these categories: Important, news, Spam, To-Do or any other single word category you see fit. To-Do emails must include a direct request requiring user action. Return only the category name.

action_items.name: Action Item Extraction
action_items.template: Extract tasks from the email. Respond in JSON format: { "tasks": [ { "task": "...", "deadline": "..." } ] }. If no tasks, return { "tasks": [] }.

auto_reply.name: Auto-Reply Draft
auto_reply.template: Draft a polite reply to this email. If it is a meeting request, ask for an agenda. Keep it professional and concise.
